channel.title: Help with running a server on Xp home... i have seroius problems
channel.description:
Well here is my problem... I am useing project 16 4.5 and this is my problem...
When I start my server and when about 12 to 13 people log in it wont let anymore people get on... It just says error connecting to server.... I have set the max connections in the server.Java to 2000 and still nothing... I am thinking that it is xp home.... I have heard that xp home is limited to its server capability... Do I Need to upgrade to professional or is there some reg hack to allow more connections... Please help thanks!!
I am also useing broadband if that helps... Edit/Delete Message[br][size=1]Posted at: September 06, 2006, 06:01:02 PM[/size][hr]If this is not the problem... then what is... I really need help here
